reviewText: If you're concerned about America, and the government being out control, you need to beg, borrow or steal this DVD (but not mine please). I wasn't surprised at the level of unnecessary secrecy our government operates under - and this very impartial DVD brings things home clearly.

It is exciting to know what and how the government protect Americans against terrorists all across the continent. The electronic surveillance works day and night. However, it is people power of low tech prevented the underwear bomber or the New York truck bomber. Despite the latest heavy investment of sophisticated weapon and defense shield, do American feel safer ten years after the terrorists attack? This investigation report reveals government endeavor in prevention and protection. The program interviewed Richard Clark who made good advice in his books in dealing with people of Islam. How would American deal with Countries such as Indonesia and Pakistan which is a dominated Islamic with nuclear weapon? Will the Africa and Middle-East Spring bring about world stability with democracy? When the twin towers collapse, We speak in one voice, When the fire is burning, we become one faith, When firemen and policemen are hurt, we share one blood, When people are killed, we become one family, When the rescue operation is going on, we say a prayer Let us stand and hold hands together to honor and remember the victims on the day of infamy 9/11 We are hit but still alive We are wounded but not defeated Our twin towers fell and we bleed We will get up quickly and ready to fight again The eagle is high, strong and free from the fire and ashes We will unite in diversity, Justice will prevail! May God bless the United States of America.Against All Enemies: Inside America's War on Terror
